body: I feel like they're just gonna drift apart, Mao now completely disappointed in the whore his beloved sister has become, and ultimately the sister's probably just gonna continue being a slut until she meets the wrong person/people and potentially get dragged into prostitution and drugs, and likely thrown away with a stranger's child alone, perhaps she will die alone somewhere... Maybe Mao will run across her randomly out on the streets somewhere, maybe not, maybe she will die all alone. That's usually how these stories end anyways.
The sister is actually really freakin' cute

Oh boy... at this moment, mi think his sister life was getting more danger than she become prostitute back in city. Mi got feel lil bro was absolute sadist yandere boy. Mi not gonna surprise if later story got an "amputee" and "bdsm" tag.

Poor kid. Falls in love with his own sister, only for her to go off and become a worthless whore. You can see how sad that makes him and how much he hates that he can’t help feeling this way after he finishes, how much he wishes he could have changed things and saved his sister.
The art takes some getting used to, but the story is good. Sad that she changed so much from how he knew her, but at least he got to be her first bareback.
why this feel so unsettle. the seperate time, the relation ship, the fucked up sis, the false future.

guy doesn't seem yandere, exactly. he seems lost. like he can't forgive his sister for leaving, uses sex to express not just need & affection, but also punitive dominance & hostility, his feelings all tangled up w/ no separation. then again, we never get a clear, full sense of thei relationship dynamics & respective histories. we can tell that the roots of what we see run deep, but they remain hidden.
@Terrano-san BRO SAMEEE
It's nice, but something felt really off. Dunno what, but I just got a weird feeling that didn't sit right with me as I went through this.
nice    art

"the scam that is marriage" y'all ever read a comment and just suddenly know, in your heart of hearts, with absolutel certainty and clarity, that the person who wrote it is deeply, permanently unhappy

Nice, shows the love of siblings 
Seeing our sibling and family after years can be overwhelming 
The story is ok for the most part, the initiation doesn't make sense, just like that? And the end is clichéd "sure I'll come back often!" Oh you will keep coming that's for sure 
The scenes are ok, the classic ones nothing special there
The art is unique, nothing else to say there
Overall 7.5/10 "there are no brakes on the rape train"
Wow this was kinda sad but like all the others great art. The sister even outed herself as masochistic slut and the brother overreacted a bit at one point but i also don't think he's a yandere.
art is nice

Save your overly effeminate spiel for twitter or whatever your likely origin point is. I never mentioned anything about the scam that is marriage, loyalty is entirely separated from the concept. Assuming their existence, still hypothetical of course, then any other man would indeed be random and transitory within the context of the doujin.

I mean, he's 20 and she is the older sister... It's not like its weird that she is not a virgin? She could have slept with boyfriend(s) as opposed to "some random douche". Basically, after thinking through it, you're just kind of an asshole Arks80. Perhaps certain religious groups would have problems with premarital sex, but I'm pretty sure they wouldn't be here either.

He's probably right to call her a slut to be honest, but for a different reason than just the pill. Note how she specifies she's never "taken one raw before", rather than just "taken one before". Did she fuck some random douche with protection? I don't know. This is why virgin and non-virgin tags would save a lot of trouble.
need more stuff in this style dayum

@SkullNoise, nah, I didn't mean that this story had a manga. I meant that the artstyle reminded me a little of a manga called High Score Girl, which is a romance manga with gaming twist to it. Basically the boy and girl grow up in the era of arcade games like Street Fighter and bond over them. I can't recommend it enough since it's such a hidden gem. @Oh_Shit_im_sorry, I find it kinda funny you consider this consensual incest to be no breaks fucked up. This is basically on the same level as vanilla here.
Now that's why I keep coming here. For fucked up masterpieces that literally have "No brakes" on them. Absolutely stunning.
